Part - III: (Defect Details)
a) Defect Category: Major
b) Defect Observed: Compressor stall during acceleration. Abnormality observed during system test.
Part IV: Investigation: (Details of Examination including previous similar Defects)
a) Root Cause Analysis: Environmental exposure causing accelerated degradation of protective coatings
b) Findings / Conclusions: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Exhaust System component. Testing
confirmed performance below acceptable limits.
c) Remedial Measures Conduct detailed inspection of all similar components in fleet
i. Corrective Action:
ii. Preventive Action: Reduce inspection interval for affected component type
d) Attributable Code: M - Other Reasons
Remarks: Complete defect analysis performed. Lessons learned documented.
Part V: Remarks by Design
Design review completed. No design modification required. Component replacement as per maintenance manual is adequate.
Date: 14/03/2024 Authorized Signatory of Design: Wg Cdr B.P. Gupta
